DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess changes in cerebral oxygenation during two different types (beractant and poractant) and two different routes (double lumen or single lumen endotracheal tube) of surfactant administration using near infrared spectroscopy (NIRS).
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Surfactant Administration on Cerebral Oxygenation
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of respiratory distress syndrome <32 gestational weeks and/or <1500 g birthweight major congenital anomalies complex congenital heart diseases
